items.sentence: Tom told me that he thought that Mary was drunk.
Tom told me that he thought that Mary was tired.
Tom told me that he thought that Mary was upset.
Tom told me that he thought that Mary was right.
Tom told me that he thought that Mary was ready.
Tom borrowed a pair of pruning shears from Mary.
He failed his exams through not studying enough.
There was a tall fence around the swimming pool.
I haven't had a home-cooked meal in a long time.
I had a hard time getting the kids to go to bed.
